    Calculate the XOR of all pairwise sums of elements in the given array.

    Parameters:
    arr (list of int): The array of integers.

    Returns:
    int: The XOR of all pairwise sums of the elements in the array.
    """
    n = len(arr)
    b = max(arr).bit_length()
    res = 0
    vals = arr
    for i in range(b + 1):
        b2 = 2 << i
        b1 = 1 << i
        a0 = [aa for aa in arr if aa & b1 == 0]
        a1 = [aa for aa in arr if aa & b1]
        arr = a0 + a1
        vals = [aa % b2 for aa in arr]
        cnt = 0
        (x1, x2, y1) = (n - 1, n - 1, n - 1)
        for (j, v) in enumerate(vals):
            while x1 > -1 and vals[x1] >= b1 - v:
                x1 -= 1
            while y1 > -1 and vals[y1] > b2 - v - 1:
                y1 -= 1
            (x, y) = (x1 + 1, y1 + 1)
            cnt += y - x
            if x <= j < y:
                cnt -= 1
            while x2 > -1 and vals[x2] >= b2 + b1 - v:
                x2 -= 1
            (x, y) = (x2 + 1, n)
            cnt += y - x
            if x > j < y:
                cnt -= 1
        res += b1 * (cnt // 2 % 2)
    return res
